plugins.name: Mermaid to FigJam
plugins.description:
## ✨ New Features


### FigJam → Mermaid Conversion

- **Section-based conversion**: Select any FigJam Section and convert all flowchart elements within it to Mermaid code

- **Smart node mapping**: Automatically generates clean, sequential node IDs (A, B, C... AA, AB... for 26+ nodes)

- **Shape recognition**: Correctly identifies rectangles, diamonds, and circles from FigJam shapes

- **Connection preservation**: Maintains all connections with labels and arrow types

- **Large diagram support**: Handles flowcharts with 100+ nodes efficiently


### Enhanced UI/UX

- **Dynamic button states**: FigJam → Mermaid button is enabled only when a Section is selected

- **Improved UI layout**: Cleaner interface with Sample Flowchart and Clear links

- **Real-time feedback**: Clear status messages for successful conversions

- **Bilingual support**: Works seamlessly with both English and Japanese text


### Technical Improvements

- **Robust error handling**: Graceful handling of edge cases and missing connections

- **Performance optimizations**: Efficient processing of large diagrams

- **Debug logging**: Comprehensive logging for troubleshooting (in development mode)


## 🔄 Conversion Capabilities


### Mermaid → FigJam (Enhanced)

- Automatic Section creation with timestamp

- Optimized layout algorithm with branch/merge point detection

- Smart connector routing to minimize overlaps

- Support for all Mermaid node shapes and connection types


### FigJam → Mermaid (New)

- Clean Mermaid code generation

- Preserves flowchart structure and logic

- Handles complex branching and merging patterns

- Maintains connection labels and directionality


## 📋 Usage


1. **Mermaid → FigJam**: Paste your Mermaid code and click convert

2. **FigJam → Mermaid**: Select a Section containing your flowchart and click convert

3. **Sample Flowchart**: Click to insert a sample Mermaid diagram

4. **Clear**: Reset the text area for new input


## 🛠️ Technical Details


- **Node ID Generation**: Intelligent mapping system supporting unlimited nodes

- **Shape Mapping**: FigJam shapes are correctly interpreted as Mermaid syntax

- **Section Detection**: Automatic detection of selected Sections for conversion

- **Color Scheme**: Light blue nodes (#C2E5FF) with blue connectors (#3DADFF)


## 🐛 Bug Fixes


- Fixed node positioning issues within Sections

- Resolved connector overlap problems in complex diagrams

- Corrected shape detection for rounded rectangles

- Fixed text encoding issues for Japanese characters


## 🔧 Requirements


- FigJam (Figma) desktop or web application

- Sections must be used for FigJam → Mermaid conversion


## 🚀 Getting Started


1. Install the plugin in FigJam

2. Try the Sample Flowchart to see the conversion in action

3. Use your own Mermaid code or convert existing FigJam diagrams


---


**Note**: This plugin is designed to work with standard flowchart patterns. Complex FigJam designs with custom shapes or annotations may not convert perfectly to Mermaid syntax.
plugins.tagline: Seamlessly convert between Mermaid code and FigJam diagrams. Code to visual,    visual to code.

plugins.name: Slice Creator
plugins.description:
✂️ Slice Creator Plugin -- USE FOR EMAILS (KLAVIYO)

Easily split any selected element into even horizontal slices! Perfect for layouts, grids, or exporting assets. 🎉


How to Use 🚀

  1. Select a single element on your Figma canvas.
  2. Enter the number of slices in the plugin.
  3. Hit Create Slices to generate slices instantly!

Features ✨

  1. Quick, precise horizontal slicing.
  2. Auto-selects and zooms into the slices.
  3. Simple and seamless integration.

Limitations ⚠️

  1. Works with one element at a time.
  2. Only creates horizontal slices.

🎯 Perfect for efficient, consistent slicing!
plugins.tagline: Figma Plugin enables users to create evenly sliced sections of a selected element on the canvas.

plugins.name: Quick Rename
plugins.description:
Automatically renames frames and components in Figma based on their auto-layout properties. It helps designers maintain consistent and meaningful layer naming conventions, making it easier to understand the structure and purpose of elements in complex designs.


Key features


  1. Renames frames with auto-layout to "Column", "Row", or "Wrap" based on their layout mode
  2. Labels frames without auto-layout as "Container"
  3. Identifies frames containing text as "Content"
  4. Rename all shapes as "Vector"
  5. Preserves naming for component instances
  6. Reset text layers names


Benefits


  1. Saves time on manual renaming
  2. Improves file organization and readability
  3. Enhances collaboration by providing clear visual hierarchy
  4. Helps maintain consistency across design systems
  5. Makes it easier to identify and update layout structures
plugins.tagline: Essential keyboard shortcut to rename layers

plugins.name: Athlon TOC
plugins.description:
Navigate Your Figma Projects Like Never Before


A tool to streamline your design workflow. This powerful plugin automatically generates a detailed table of contents for your Figma files, making navigation through complex projects a breeze.


Features and Benefits:


Automatic Detection: The tool scans your Figma file and automatically identifies all sections and frames, organizing them into a clear, concise table of contents.


Clickable Links: Each entry in the table of contents is a clickable link, allowing you to jump directly to the relevant section or frame. No more scrolling through endless layers to find what you need!


Dynamic Updates: As your project evolves, rerunning the tool dynamically updates the table of contents to reflect changes, ensuring that you always have an up-to-date overview.


Vertical Auto-Layout: The table of contents is presented in a neatly organized vertical auto-layout frame, providing a clear and structured overview of your document.


Customizable Layout: While the tool takes care of the heavy lifting, you retain full control over the layout and presentation of your table of contents, ensuring it complements your design process.


Easy to Use:

Simply install the plugin, run it within your Figma file, and watch as it transforms your workflow, saving you time and effort.
plugins.tagline: Navigate with Ease: Instant Table of Contents for Your Figma Files

plugins.name: Figma to Celtra
plugins.description:
Transform your design workflow with the "Figma to Celtra" integration! Effortlessly import your stunning Figma designs into Celtra's design workspace and unlock the power of creative automation.


Key Features:

  1. Streamlined Workflow: Continue your pre-production processes and create conceptual designs in Figma, then drop them into Celtra with ease for a cohesive and efficient design experience.
  2. Efficient Importing: Easily transition your designs from Figma to Celtra using a simple copy and paste function. Whether you're working with single layers or multiple artboards, the process is quick and hassle-free.
  3. Layer Mapping: Experience seamless compatibility as all layer types from Figma are mapped to their corresponding layers in Celtra. Make configurations effortlessly for Images, Text, Shapes, and Groups right after you import.


Once your designs are in Celtra, take advantage of creative automation to scale your content across various sizes and design variations without missing a beat. Upgrade your design collaboration and scaling capabilities today by using "Figma to Celtra", and take the first step toward a more streamlined creative workflow.


Note that this plugin is compatible only with design files created in Celtra's Creative Automation platform.
plugins.tagline: Seamless Design Integration

plugins.name: Layer Name Modifier
plugins.description:
The Layer Name Modifier plugin makes it much easier to organize and manage your layer names in Figma, helping you keep your projects more organized and consistent. With this plugin, you can perform the following actions:


  1. Add a Text to Layer Names: Easily append a word of your choice to the end of layer names.
  2. Remove a Text from Layer Names: Quickly remove any unwanted word from the layer names.
  3. Remove a Text from Only the Last Words of Layer Names: Use this feature to remove a specific word only from the last words of the layer names.

This plugin is a perfect tool for organizing and standardizing layer names, especially in large projects. Save time and make your workflow more efficient!


HOW TO USE THIS PLUGIN?

Add text to layer name

  1. Select the layers you want to add t text o the layer names.
  2. Run the plugin.
  3. Enter the text you want to add to the layer names into the input.
  4. When you click the Add Text button, the text you entered is added to the layer name.


Remove text from layer name

  1. Select the layers you want to remove texts from the layer names.
  2. Run the plugin.
  3. Select the "Remove text" checkbox.
  4. Enter the text you want to remove from the layer names into the input.
  5. When you click the "Remove text" button, the relevant word in the selected layers is removed.
  6. If you only want to process the last words of the layer name, check the relevant checkbox.
  7. When you click the Remove Text button, the text you entered into the input is deleted if it is the last word of the layer name.
plugins.tagline: Layer Name Modifier helps organize and manage layer names in Figma, keeping projects consistent.

plugins.name: Dynamo
plugins.description:
Effortlessly increase design quality and accessibility


  1. Live preview Dynamic Type in real time
  2. Spot where text needs to wrap or truncate
  3. Add your scaled designs to the canvas with a click
  4. Saves you a ton of time


What's Dynamic Type?


Many users set a text size other than the default in order to read content more comfortably. Supporting Dynamic Type and larger text sizes is an important accessibility requirement. Dynamo scales text layers in your designs to test how they handle larger text sizes. Making it much easier to increase the quality, robustness, and inclusivity of your designs.


For best results


  1. Use auto layout in your designs so that layouts remain in tact once text layers have scaled
  2. To ignore a text layer, prepend its name with a period


Please leave comments and feedback below.

plugins.name: Mercurius - Smart Exporter for WEBP, PNG, and JPG
plugins.description:
🎨 Mercurius - Smart Exporter for WEBP, PNG, and JPG


Mercurius is a Figma plugin that analyzes and exports images in multiple formats (WEBP, PNG, or JPG) with AI-generated descriptions. The plugin uses OpenAI's API to generate accurate descriptions and suggest meaningful file names while automatically optimizing file size.


Quick Export Mode 📦

For when you just need to export images quickly with optimization


  1. Select an image, frame, or component in Figma
  2. Click "Export Image" on the home screen
  3. You'll see: selected frame name, image dimensions, aspect ratio
  4. Configure export settings: choose format (WEBP, PNG, or JPG), set maximum file size in MB, select export scale (1x, 2x, 3x, 5x)
  5. Click "Export" to save your optimized image


AI-Powered Export Mode 🤖

For when you want AI assistance with descriptions and smart file naming


  1. Select an image, frame, or component in Figma
  2. First-time setup: Enter your OpenAI API key: the key will be securely saved for future use
  3. Click "Analyze Image" on the home screen
  4. The AI will analyze and provide: smart image description, SEO-friendly file name suggestion, image dimensions and aspect ratio
  5. Configure export settings: choose format (WEBP, PNG, or JPG), set maximum file size in MB, select export scale (1x, 2x, 3x, 5x)
  6. Click "Export" to save your image with the AI-suggested name



Both modes feature automatic image optimization to meet your file size requirements while maintaining the best possible quality.
plugins.tagline: Smart image analysis and export for WEBP, PNG, or JPG with GPT descriptions and size optimization

Whether you’re working with rectangles, text, or complex auto-layout frames, AutoLayers ensures your layers are consistently named and organized.


With support for multiple selected frames, this plugin helps you keep your Figma files tidy and easy to navigate, saving you time and effort on manual renaming.


AutoLayers ver1.0.2 by Kemonn98

Last Updated: September 9. 2024

muhsalmon.com

plugins.name: GPT To I18n
plugins.description:
GptToI18n是一款非常实用的插件工具！它不仅能够轻松地的一键生成i18n，还可以将设计稿瞬间转化为多种语言版本，让您轻松应对全球市场。




一键生成i18n json。这意味着您可以在不需要编写任何代码的情况下，自动将设计稿翻译成其他语言。这不仅可以节省您的时间和精力，还能提高工作效率。




我们推荐在草稿状态下完成，您只需要按住 ctrl + p 打开GptToI18n插件，选择您需要转换的范围和目标语言，然后点击获取JSON，只需要等待几秒就能完成 i18n JSON生成。可以看到的 Text name 也做了对应处理。




如果您需要将设计稿转换成目标语言版本，您只需要点击根据 JSON 翻译页面即可。




一键将设计稿转化为各种语言的版本。无论您的客户在世界的哪个角落，他们只需要打开您的设计稿，就可以立即理解您的产品。




当然，如果您没有输入OpenAi API 密钥，获取对应 JSON 需要消耗 tokens ，如果您有自己的OpenAi API 密钥，那么您可以尽情的使用。




所以，如果您是一个善于尝试新工具的人，那么GptToi18n绝对是一个不容错过的好选择。它不仅可以帮助您节省时间和精力，提高工作效率，还可以让您的产品更轻松地走进全球市场。快来试试吧，让它为您的工作带来更多的便利和成功！


GptToI18n is a very useful plugin tool! Not only can it easily generate i18n with one click, but it can also instantly convert designs into multiple language versions, so that you can easily respond to the global market.


Generate i18n json in one click. This means that you can automatically translate your designs into other languages without having to write any code. This will not only save you time and effort, but also improve your productivity.


We recommend that you finish in draft state, you just need to hold down ctrl + p to open the GptToI18n plugin, select the scope and target language you want to convert, and then click Get JSON, only need to wait a few seconds to complete the i18n JSON generation. The Text name that can be seen is also processed.


If you need to convert your design to the target language version, just click Translate Page from JSON.


Convert design drafts into various languages with one click. No matter where your customers are in the world, they just need to open your design manuscript and instantly understand your product.


Of course, if you do not enter the OpenAi API key, it will cost tokens to get the corresponding JSON, and if you have your own OpenAi API key, then you can use it as much as you like.


So, if you are someone who is good at trying out new tools, then GptToi18n is definitely a good choice not to be missed. It can not only help you save time and effort, improve work efficiency, but also make it easier for your products to enter the global market. Give it a try and let it bring more convenience and success to your work!

plugins.name: Stash Modes
plugins.description: This plugin enables you to "stash" variable modes within your Figma file. A stashed mode is essentially a copy of an existing mode. Although it is not directly accessible for pages and frames, you can later swap it back as a "real" mode. This feature proves handy when you want to experiment with different settings while preserving your original modes.
plugins.tagline: Save variable modes for later

78580.name: Stash Modes

78580.release_notes: Cosmetic changes and Bugfixes. After the Update it might be necessary to click reload once to see the stashed modes.

plugins.name: Samenamer
plugins.description: This Figma plugin allows you to select and color all frames on the current page that share the same name as the frame you have currently selected. After selecting a frame, the plugin will scan the page for other frames with the same name and select them automatically. The selected frames will then be colored red to make them stand out. This can be useful for quickly identifying and grouping related design elements within a Figma file.
plugins.tagline: same name frame similar names mark same frames

plugins.name: Color Contrast Analyzer
plugins.description: Color Contrast Analyzer helps you quickly evaluate and improve the accessibility of your designs by measuring color contrast ratios in accordance with WCAG (Web Content Accessibility Guidelines). When accessibility fails, it suggests alternative colors to ensure your text is readable and meets accessibility standards—all within Figma.
plugins.tagline: Check & Fix Color Contrast for Accessible Designs

plugins.name: UX4G Theme Craft
plugins.description: UX4G Theme Builder empowers designers to create and customize government-compliant design systems effortlessly. Tailored for the Indian Government's UX4G initiative, this plugin simplifies theming, enabling you to generate color palettes, typography, and component styles that align with the UX4G Design System. Build visually consistent and user-friendly interfaces in minutes with our intuitive interface and robust customization options.
plugins.tagline: Effortless Customization for UX4G Design System

plugins.name: Obra Icons
plugins.description:
The Obra Icons plugin features:


  1. 1000+ icons: this set has an icon for everything you need. We specifically chose the icons to work well in user interfaces.
  2. 3 weights: every icon can be added to your designs in 3 different weights, with stroke widths of 2px, 1.5px and 1px
  3. Sizes: Set your icons in different sizes, from the smallest size at 12 by 12 pixels to 64 by 64 pixels.
  4. Change colours: Ability to change the color of pasted icons, even to save your own custom colors to the plugin
  5. Keyword search: search icons not just by their name, but also by extensive extra keywords, to make it easier to find what you are looking for


View all Obra icons on the web via our website icons.obra.studio.

accepted.name: Obra Studio
accepted.description: Obra Studio helps software companies get to the next design level

plugins.tagline: The official Obra Icons Figma plugin
